title: Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set, 23.6inch Wreath and 8.8 Feet Garland with Pines Cones, Berry Clusters, Frosted Branches, 100 LED Warm Lights for Indoor Outdoor Christmas Decorations
descriptions:
Bring the joy and sparkle of the holiday season to your home with ease using our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set. This charming set is perfect for creating a warm and inviting atmosphere without any of the hassle.

**Product Name:** Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set

**Key Features:**
- **No Fuss Assembly:** With no assembly required, you can easily hang this beautiful wreath and garland straight out of the box.
- **Perfect Size:** The wreath measures a generous 23.6 inches in diameter, while the garland extends to 8.8 feet, ideal for adorning your doors and mantelpieces.
- **Delightful Decorations:** Adorned with lovely snowflake pine needle branches, two types of rustic pine cones, cheerful berry clusters, and elegant frosted branches, this set will surely be a festive focal point.
- **Warm, Twinkling Lights:** The set is pre-lit with 100 LED warm lights, creating a cozy glow that lights up any room.
- **Battery Operated:** Operated by 3 AA batteries (not included), it keeps your spaces free of unsightly cords.
- **Smart Timer Function:** The built-in timer turns the lights on for 6 hours and off for 18 hours, offering convenience and saving energy.
- **Safe & Hypoallergenic:** Made from sturdy, high-quality materials with hypoallergenic and fireproof properties, ensuring a safe holiday season for you and your loved ones.
- **Built to Last:** Strong and durable, this set is designed to be maintenance-free, never fade, and last for many Christmases to come.
- **Indoor & Outdoor Use:** Whether you want to decorate your living room, bedroom, dining area, or even your outdoor spaces, this versatile set can bring festive cheer anywhere.
- **Warranty & Support:** We stand by our product with a full 365-day warranty and our customer service is available 24 hours to answer any questions or concerns.

Celebrate the holidays with a touch of elegance and the peace of mind that comes with a hassle-free, durable decoration. The Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is the perfect addition to your festive traditions.

Celebrate the holiday season with ease and elegance using our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set! Boasting a generous 23.6-inch wreath and a complementary 8.8-foot garland, this set is adorned with charming snowflake-touched pine needle branches, two distinct types of pine cones, delightful berry clusters, and elegantly frosted branches.

Our set comes to life with 100 radiant LED lights, casting a warm and inviting glow that promises to make your festive decor truly shine. There's no need to worry about power, as the lights are efficiently operated with just 3 AA batteries (please note, batteries are not included). Additionally, the built-in timer function automatically brightens your space for 6 hours and then rests for 18 hours, ensuring a worry-free, festive ambiance every evening.

Designed with you in mind, there's absolutely no assembly required. Crafted from sturdy, high-quality materials that are both hypoallergenic and fireproof, this set is not only strong and durable but also safe for everyone to enjoy. Plus, with no maintenance needed and a guarantee to never fade, you can look forward to celebrating many Christmases to come with this beautiful set.

Whether you prefer to decorate indoors or out, this wreath and garland set is perfect for beautifying walls, doors, fireplaces, and moreâ€”all without the hassle of real greenery. And for your peace of mind, we offer a 365-day warranty along with 24-hour customer service availability.

Bring home the festive spirit without the fuss. Our Pre-Lit Artificial Christmas Wreath Garland Set is the perfect touch to complete your holiday decoration with ease and charm.
